ph_menu_content: Please enter menu content, one per line
ph_menu_title: Please enter menu title, within 40 characters
tip_need_auto_reply: Auto reply needs to be enabled
tip_appid_1: 1: Mini program can only fill in its own appid;
tip_appid_2: 2: Official account can only fill in the appid of the mini program associated with the official account;
tip_mini_path: Mini program path refers to the address of a specific page of the mini program. Please contact the mini program developer to get the path, e.g. pages/index/index?a=2&b=1.
ph_open_link: Please enter open link, must include http:// or https://
msg_link_http_error: Link must start with http or https
msg_appid_error: The entered appid may not be a mini program appid, please check and verify.
msg_add_menu_title: Please add at least one menu title
msg_complete_rule_keyword: Please complete rule name and keyword
msg_add_reply_item: Please add at least one reply content
msg_save_failed: Save failed, please try again later
msg_complete_mini_card: Please complete mini program card information
msg_complete_menu_content: Please complete menu name and menu content
msg_load_failed: Load rule failed, please try again later
